title: Event_Verify that all RenewalOrderCategories are included in the response
custom_preconds:
1. Create multiple Renewal Groups & payment plans in baseball supplier
2. Create multiple events & Packages and distribute the above created Renewal groups to them.
3. Create the below transactions (both event & Package) for a patron
- Reservation order
- Receivable order with PENDING_SCHEDULED_PAYMENTS
- Receivable order with PENDING_MANUAL_PAYMENTS
- Receivable order with ASSIGNED_SCHEDULED_PAYMENTS


in order to get all different of order we need to do the following cases for A SINGLE PATRON:
C1820288
C1820289
C1820290
C1820291
Get renewals Order
https://auto1.provenueapp.com:18443/api/v2/patrons/1042463/renewalOrders?renewalOrderCategory=ALL

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch Postman tool
2. Select the method as GET

3. Enter Authorization and Header details
4. Run V2 GetRenewalOrders API for the patron accounts and with request parameter "category" with value ALL_OPEN

Example: https://HOST:PORT/api/v2/renewalOrders/patronAccounts/1001&category=ALL_OPEN
5. Verify that all RenewalOrderCategories are included in the response
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Tool should be launched successfully
2. Method should be selected as GET
3. Header and authorization details should be filled successfully
4. User should be able to run the request
5. All RenewalOrderCategories should be included in the response
